siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We’re only $100 dollars away from reaching our goal in support of Pastor Fritsche. Next up, Stan and Jon talk about New Years Resolutions. Neither are resolution purists but set certain goals and try to cultivate habits. This week we also find out that Stan and Jon…

frontmatter.title: New Year's Resolutions and Note-Taking Apps.

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We are just days away from Christmas, Stan and Jon kick off the episode talking about Christmas leading into a special Christmas themed milkshake segment - “Egg nog - milkshake? Distant cousin of the milkshake?” That leads into a real milkshake segment! Both Stan…

frontmatter.title: Support Pastor Fritsche, get a Sticker.
